quoteText: <li>“Crawls,” “scrapes,” or “spiders” any page, data, or portion of or relating to the Services or Content (through use of manual or automated means)
title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service

tosdr.case: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state that, "You represent, warrant, and agree that you will not contribute any Content or User Submission (each of those terms is defined below) or otherwise use the Services or interact with the Services in a manner that . . . “Crawls,” “scrapes,” or “spiders” any page, data, or portion of or relating to the Services or Content (through use of manual or automated means)."
